Package aima.core.util

Class CancelableThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • aima.core.util.CancelableThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimulationThread
    public class CancelableThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Implements a thread with an additional flag indicating cancellation.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde, Mike Stampone
